mapper.update: update boardroom_info set office_id = #{officeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, br_name = #{brName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, br_floor = #{brFloor,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, br_capacity = #{brCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, equipment = #{equipment,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where br_id = #{brId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select br_id, office_id, br_name, br_floor, br_capacity, equipment, status, is_delete, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from boardroom_info where br_id = #{brId,jdbcType=CHAR}
